urls.value: <content>Sign In</content> <title>Sign in with an existing account</title> <href>/login?redirectTo=%2F</href> <rule>isLoggedOut</rule> <secure>true</secure>

fragment.content:
Site Information

This site requires a user account.

If you would like a user account, please contact the administrator so that your information can be verified.

Once your information is approved, you will receive an invitation to join the site.

page.name: add_product.shtml
page.title: Add a Product
page.description: Add a product to the web site

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add a Product

You must be signed in to add a product. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Add a Product?

  1. Connect with others that share your interests or cause
  2. It's FREE to get started!

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Product
portlet.introductionMessage: Enter information below to add a product to the site, the product will be approved by an administrator
Enter information below about the product
portlet.successMessage: The product will now await approval.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
How to add a Product

  1. Pick a product name that will be clear to prospective members.
  2. Provide as much detail as possible.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can add a Product?

Any member can add a product.

page.name: add_partner.shtml
page.title: Add a Partner
page.description: Add a partner for reviews, ratings, maps, discussions, tools and more

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add a Partner

You must be signed in to add a partner. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Join?

As a member of the site, youâll be able to:

  1. Write reviews
  2. Start Groups
  3. Post Events
  4. Create a blog
  5. And much more

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Partner
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if the partner already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, enter listing information about the partner. After completing this form, our staff will contact you to verify your information and help you get started.
portlet.successMessage: Thank you for requesting an addition to the directory. We'll double check these details before making your entry public. This process shouldn't take more than two business days. It usually takes a few hours.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
How to Add a Partner

  1. You enter the details for the partner
  2. We confirm those partner details
  3. The partner profile is enabled

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can Add a Partner?

Anybody can add a partner. If youâre the owner or authorized representative, you can add a partner and manage the profile. If youâre a member that thinks one of your favorite partners is missing, you can submit that partner too.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can Manage a Partner Profile?

  1. Only the owner or authorized representative of a partner can manage its profile.
  2. We confirm your relationship to the partner through email and/or phone.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
How to Manage a Partner Profile

  1. Identify yourself as owner or representative when you Add a Partner.
  2. We confirm your relationship to the partner
  3. Youâre enabled as âmanagerâ to edit the profile

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add a Business

You must be signed in to add a business. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Business
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if your business already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, enter listing information about your business or organization. After completing this form, our staff will contact you to verify your business and help you get started.
portlet.isOwnerMessage: By checking this box, you are verifying that you are affiliated with or employed by this business. You must check this box if you would like tools to manage, modify, or enhance your listing information.
portlet.successMessage: Thank you for requesting an addition to the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can add a business?

Any member can add a business. If you're the owner or authorized representative, you can add a business and manage the profile. If you're a community member that thinks one of your favorite businesses is missing, you can submit that business too.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add an Organization

You must be signed in to add an organization. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add an Organization
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if your organization already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, enter listing information about your organization. After completing this form, our staff will contact you to verify your organization and help you get started.
portlet.isOwnerMessage: By checking this box, you are verifying that you are affiliated with or employed by this organization. You must check this box if you would like tools to manage, modify, or enhance your listing information.
portlet.successMessage: Thank you for requesting an addition to the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can add an organization?

Any member can add an organization. If you're the owner or authorized representative, you can add an organization and manage the profile. If you're a community member that thinks one of your favorite organizations is missing, you can submit that organization too.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add a Committee

The site administrator can add a committee.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Committee
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if the committee already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, enter listing information about the committee.
portlet.isOwnerMessage: By checking this box, you are verifying that you are affiliated with or employed by this organization. You must check this box if you would like tools to manage, modify, or enhance your listing information.
portlet.successMessage: Thank you for requesting an addition to the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can add a committee?

The site administrator can add a committee.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add a Sponsor

You must be signed in to add a sponsor. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Sponsor
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if the sponsor already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, enter listing information about your business or organization. After completing this form, our staff will contact you to verify the sponsor and help you get started.
portlet.isOwnerMessage: By checking this box, you are verifying that you are affiliated with or employed by this sponsor. You must check this box if you would like tools to manage, modify, or enhance your listing information.
portlet.successMessage: Thank you for requesting an addition to the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can add a sponsor?

Any member can add a sponsor. If you're the owner or authorized representative, you can add a sponsor and manage the profile. If you're a community member that thinks one of your favorite sponsors is missing, you can submit that sponsor too.

page.name: start_group.shtml
page.title: Start a Group
page.description: Start a group to collaborate with others

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Start a Group

You must be signed in to start a group. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Start a Group?

  1. Connect with others that share your interests or cause
  2. Get tools to manage your own community around your group, like blogs, wikis and forums
  3. Grow your group with new members from the community
  4. It's FREE to get started!

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Start a Group
portlet.introductionMessage: Enter information below to start your own group
portlet.successMessage: Your group is now available in the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
How to Start a Group

  1. Pick a Group name that will be clear to prospective members.
  2. Provide as much detail as possible for your Group.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can Start a Group?

Any member can start a group.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Start a Group?

  1. Connect with others that share your interests or cause.
  2. Get tools to manage your own community around your group, like blogs, wikis and forums.
  3. Grow your group with new members from the community.
  4. It's FREE!

page.name: add_department.shtml
page.title: Add a Department
page.description: Add a department to collaborate with others

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Start a Department

You must be signed in to start a department. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Start a Department?

  1. Connect with others that are in your department
  2. Get tools to manage your own community around your department, like blogs, wikis and forums

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Department
portlet.introductionMessage: Enter information below to add a department
portlet.successMessage: The department is now available in the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
How to Add a Department

  1. Pick a Department name that is consistent with your organization.
  2. Provide as much detail as possible for the Department.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can Add a Department?

The administrator can add a department.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Add a Department?

  1. Connect with others in your department.
  2. Each department has blogs, wikis, forums and document management.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add a Place

You must be signed in to add a place. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Place
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if the place already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, enter basic information about the place. After completing this form, the place will be searchable for others to find and start participating.
portlet.successMessage: The place is now available in the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can Add a Place?

Any member can add a place.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Add a Place?

  1. Share a place with the entire community for details and discussion.
  2. It's FREE!

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add a Neighborhood

You must be signed in to add a neighborhood Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Neighborhood
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if the neighborhood already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, enter basic information about the neighborhood. After completing this form, the neighborhood will be searchable for others to find and start participating.
portlet.successMessage: The neighborhood is now available in the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can Add a Neighborhood?

Any member can add a neighborhood.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Add a Neighborhood?

  1. Share a neighborhood with the entire community for details and discussion.
  2. It's FREE!

page.name: add_event.shtml
page.title: Add an Event
page.description: Add an event to manage your next meetup using collaboration tools

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add an Event

You must be signed in to add an event. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add an Event
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if your event already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, enter basic information about your event. After completing this form, your event will be searchable for others to find you and start participating.
portlet.successMessage: Your event is now available in the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can Add an Event?

Any member can add an event.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Add an Event?

  1. Share your event with the entire community.
  2. Improve the visibility and attendance of your event.
  3. It's FREE!

page.name: add_idea.shtml
page.title: Add an Idea
page.description: Add an idea for members to discuss, review and rate

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add an Idea

You must be signed in to add an idea. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add an Idea
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if your idea already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, describe your idea and add a picture. After completing this form, your idea will be searchable for others to find and start participating.
portlet.successMessage: Your idea is now available in the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can Add an Idea?

Any member can start an idea.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Add an Idea?

  1. Share your idea with the entire community.
  2. Let others comment, discuss and rate your idea.
  3. It's FREE!

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add a Project

You must be signed in to add a project. Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Project
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if your project already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, describe your project. After completing this form, your project will be private and you must invite others if you want them to participate.
portlet.successMessage: Your project is now available in the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can add a project?

Any member that has received permission from an administrator can add a project.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Add a Cluster

You must be signed in to add a cluster Click here to sign in

Don't have an account? We'll get you set up once you click here.

portlet.name: AddProjectByCategoryPortlet
portlet.title: Add a Cluster
portlet.introductionMessage: Please search to see if the cluster already exists before requesting for it to be added. Next, enter basic information about the cluster. After completing this form, the cluster will be searchable for others to find and start participating.
portlet.successMessage: The cluster is now available in the directory.
portlet.failureMessage: The information could not be saved.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Who can Add a Cluster?

Admins can add a cluster.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
Why Add a Cluster?

  1. Share a cluster with the entire community for details and discussion.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content:
You must be logged in to do that

Click here to login

Don't have an account? Click here and set one up.

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content: Welcome to your home page

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content: The title is: ${project.title:html}

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content: The title is: ${project.title:html}

portlet.name: ContentPortlet
portlet.content: The title is: ${project.title:html}

portlet.name: ClaimProjectPortlet
portlet.introductionMessage:
Claiming a Listing

  • By claiming a listing you will be able to manage the listing's information.
  • An email is required to complete this process because one of our application specialists will be in contact to verify ownership of listing.
  • Management of the listing will only become available after the verification process is complete.
portlet.successMessage:
You will be contacted by one of our application specialists to set up your free suite of software tools to manage your listing.

With our easy-to-use management tools, you will be able to:
- Expand your listing to include items such as photos, logos, wikis, blogs, and documents
- Place specials & classified ads
- Invite colleagues to join your listing
- Send out email messages to customers

If you have any questions about this process, please contact us.

labels.value: areYouTheOwner=I represent this listing and want more information on getting full access to its profile

portlet.name: InviteMembersPortlet
portlet.title: Send Invites
portlet.messageSubject: You have received an invitation to join ${project.title}

portlet.name: SendProjectToFriendPortlet
portlet.title: Send to Friend
portlet.failureMessage: We could not send this information to your friend...
portlet.messageBody:
Hello,
${bean.sentFromName:html} has sent you a link to the following profile:
${bean.project.title:html}
${project.shortDescription:html}
${project.addressToAndLocation:html}
See the complete profile at ${secureUrl}/show/${bean.project.uniqueId}
Message from ${bean.sentFromName:html}:
${bean.message:html}

For more information and to review our privacy and security policies, please visit ${secureUrl}

portlet.name: AddProjectToListPortlet
portlet.title: Add ${project.title:html} to List
portlet.introductionMessage:
What are Lists?

  • Lists help you keep track of interesting things you find while using the site.
  • Lists are also used for linking different profiles together.

How To Add And Remove from List

  • To add this item to a list, check the box beside the list(s) where you want to add it, or create a new list, then click Submit.
  • To view and manage your lists, click the "Lists" link on your profile menu.
  • If the item is already on the list, it will be checked, uncheck the box to remove the item
